S

Shape - Interface in factorydesignpattern
The Shape interface defines a contract requiring implementing classes to provide their own version of the draw method.
ShapeFactory - Class in factorydesignpattern
The ShapeFactory class provides a getShape method that creates and returns an object of the specific shape type (Circle, Rectangle, or Square) based on the input string, ensuring dynamic object creation, and returns null if the shape type is unsupported or invalid.
ShapeFactory() - Constructor for class factorydesignpattern.ShapeFactory
 
Square - Class in factorydesignpattern
This Square class implements the Shape interface and overrides the draw method to display and return the string "Square::Draw()"
Square() - Constructor for class factorydesignpattern.Square
